Class Keyboard

java.lang.Object
unlimitedwordle.Keyboard
public class Keyboard extends Object
Creates virtual keyboard on the window.

      public void typeLetter(String typed)
      Types the letter into the grid by sending to LevelSelector object Run the logic based on the key typed: display letters, delete letters, play the backend logic when ENTER is typed, and show pop-up based on the length of the user input
